paragraph.heading: 1Clients
paragraph.paragraph:
The clients view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_clients_color.gif displays all the classes which are using features of the current class, and thus rely on its
25_interface_format.xml interface . It is available through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
